website_summaries.verdict: This well-balanced shavette handles heavier beard growth exceptionally well. Ideal for those who need something stronger than disposable razors for proper maintenance of a long beard.
pros: Many owners praise the pinpoint control
Very balanced in hand, great control
cons: Heavier than expected, not ideal for first-time users
Handle and blade can be difficult to open

customer_reviews.title: One of a kind
customer_reviews.text: I have been a Texas licensed Stylist & Barber since 1988, 30 plus years serving all ethnic groups. I have used numerous other safety razors and blades. As of yet, Parker offers the best ultimate craftsmanship and quality. The weight, balance, and feel are next to none in professional use. Even for personal use you can't beat the practical constant good result and the cost advantages of Parker / Shark blades over other options, that are frequently shown on TV commercials for membership. Shaving is a skill and art that can easily be mastered in short practice. Once you use a straight razor you will likely fall in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... few other "shavette"-style razors and this has been the best so far
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few other "shavette"-style razors and this has been the best so far. I had a Dovo where the plastic insert got disgusting and started falling apart. I also bought another cheap no-name replacement razor where the pin completely snapped off. This Parker razor has held up much better and is still going strong. It feels much sturdier than the others and I will probably buy another one if this one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Dallin

customer_reviews.title: Great starter, needs sharper blades.
customer_reviews.text: Used this razor to practice before investing in a true straight razor. As with most razors, it's more about the blade than the razor itself. I tried using the included Shark blades it came with, but quickly had to resort to my Feather blades that I use for my safety razor. Any double edge blade will work, you just have to break it in half to use with this razor. Overall a decent substitute for a straight razor if trying to save on cost.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Staight razor that won’t break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: Got this razor yesterday and did my first shave with a straight razor in about 15 years today. I used one of the shark blades that came with it, went slow, and it performed as I wanted it too. Fit and finish was better than I expected for a razor of this price. Lettering is nicely done and secures the blade tight. Over all I’m happy I went with a straight razor again over an electric. When my son goes to start shaving I’ll bet I’ll be able to pass this to him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Just shaved with it and was VERY surprised just how smooth it is. Great for people wanting to break into straight razors and have a solid grounding in double edge safety razors. It's a heavy razor so it's own weight is all you need. Just mimic the 30 degree angle that you are accustomed to, and you will be quite surprised. The Shark blades are awesome, and this is from a die hard Feather user. I've been told to NEVER EVER use Feather blades in a shavette.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ellis Taylor-Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Good for experts or beginners
customer_reviews.text: As someone that exclusively shaves with a straight razor, I do miss the convenience of a disposable razor that doesn't need to be stropped before each use nor periodically sent off to be honed. This razor surpasses my expectations with my only complaint being that compared to my high carbon blade full hollow it struggles cleaving through more than a week long beard. It does very well when I shave daily, however. Would I buy it again? Yes, I WILL buy it again. At least three. One for my dad, my brother, and my Godson. I hope it'll get them i retested In straight razor shaving
customer_reviews.author: Sandy & Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great Razor
customer_reviews.text: The weight of this thing is very nice. It’s also a little shorter in length than most straight razors. And some people saying the chrome handle might make it slippery when wet- well, I don’t know of anyone who holds a straight razor by the scales when they shave. You’ll be fine. Just get it. It looks like it costs $100 and pure class.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Good weight, made a great gift
customer_reviews.text: My brother was interested in starting to straight razor shave, so I picked this up for him. Within an hour, I had taught him how to successfully shave his neckline and face without bleeding himself to death. The Shark blades that come with the razor are not bad, but I can imagine if you pair them with some Astra or Derby blades, you'll have yourself one amazing shavette! I may get one for myself now instead of the cheaper shavette I had tried years back.
customer_reviews.author: Alucard212

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is the best product in its price class. It is attractive, sturdy, durable, and holds single-edge razors well. After the period of learning and accidental self-mutilation, straight razors provide the best and closest shave available. If you are looking for a starter straight razor, spend the few extra dollars to get this one rather than going cheap. I love the weight, balance, and tight hold of this razor. It is easy to clean and resists rust over time. I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sir E.

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than I expected! Just read instructions and check out YouTube videos and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on the first try. I watched a few YouTube videos to make sure I wasn't going to butcher myself but this thing is pretty straightforward, and has a nice weight to it. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Pike On A Bike

customer_reviews.title: 1st time using a str8 razor. Worked perfect.
customer_reviews.text: After watching a bunch of YouTube videos and reading a ton of reviews I decided to give this razor a try. It was a lil more than some of the others but based on reviews I went for it. 6 shaves in and I'm not looking like Scareface (knock on wood). I like it alot.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie T

customer_reviews.title: Practice makes perfect
customer_reviews.text: First time using a straight razor. Sharp S.O.B.. I’m sure I’ll get the hang of it and bleed less when my cuts heal. I should have trimmed more hair off my head before attempting it. I learned my lesson for when I heal. I do enjoy its ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Atom Apple Ba

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor
customer_reviews.text: I’m new to shaving with this type of razor and right away I was able to use this to get a good close shave without nicking or cutting myself. It’s got a decent weight to it and fits very comfortably in my hand. I have no trouble maneuvering it around my face and neck. With a bit more practice and a good sharp blade I’m sure I’ll be shaving like a pro in no time.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Muller

customer_reviews.title: From safety razors to straight
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using safety razors for years to shave my face and head. I recently decided to try single edge shaving. There’s something intrinsically interesting about shaving the “old fashioned” way. As an avid knife collector, I know what’s necessary to properly maintain my knives edges, and wanted a simpler, less time consuming shaving experience. Once I decided to explore this technique, the shavette styled razor seemed like the perfect choice! After shaving with the Parker SRX, I have to say, that I’ve thoroughly enjoyed the experience, and plan to integrate straight razor shaving into my daily shave rotation.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Invest in a genuine straight razor if you are new at this.
customer_reviews.text: I recently developed an interest in learning how to shave with a straight razor, but couldn’t make up my mind which razor to start with so I purchased both the SR1 and SRX razors. These devices are unforgiving to the novice user and I would have had better luck using a box cutter or retractable utility knife. The SRX was not used and is still in its original packaging, but unfortunately it cannot be returned due to the restrictive return policy. Do yourself a favor and invest in a genuine straight razor instead.
customer_reviews.author: dpandr66

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Complete and total waste of money. I've had straight razors before and just wanted a stainless steel one that wouldn't rust but that's literally the only positive to this useless piece of metal. It takes an insane level of dexterity just to open the clasp and put a blade in and even more to take it out. There's resistance in both the placement and removal of the blade so you risk cutting yourself whenever you have the change the blade out. In the end I couldn't even get the blade out and had to throw the whole thing away. Don't waste your money on this foreign crap.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Hetzler

customer_reviews.title: Functional, but inconsistent quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice razor for the price. The finish is beautiful and it has a nice weight to it. I would have given it five stars, but mine arrived yesterday with a small nick on one of the arms that hold the blade in place. It doesn't affect the function of the razor, but it was a disappointment on such a beautiful tool. It's still very nice considering the low price, but I wouldn't pay more for something with imperfections.
customer_reviews.author: Ed S.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Do Not Buy.
customer_reviews.text: This deserves no stars. The quality is horrendous and they proudly stamp it “Made in India.” It’s garbage. I’ve never seen a product supposedly made of stainless steel look like plastic. Do yourself a favor and pony up the dollars to buy a “Made in Japan” or “Made in Germany” straight razor with some heft and balance (and quality). I returned this instantly and bought a real straight razor ... much happier for it
customer_reviews.author: HereBeDragons

customer_reviews.title: Economic,sturdy and fit right in my hand
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the Parker Razor Blade for six months now. It has not lost his shine, the handle fit my hand properly . The only issue that I have is sometimes it is hard to replace the blade, but is not really a big deal. The razor serves the purpose well and I will buy again if needed. The price is very reasonable considering the sturdiness of the material. Also the razor have not rust or stained.
customer_reviews.author: Futbolking1

customer_reviews.title: A great investment!
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for a good shavette that wasn’t too much money(since I’ve never used one before) but also good quality. I found this one and read all the bad reviews and it put a bad taste in my mouth but despite that I read the good ones and wanted to take the risk. It was well worth it! I used it to line up my beard and the rest of my face. The blades it came with were sharp! I just finished using it for the first time and I didn’t cut myself nor get razor burn. This is a great product and I recommend buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler B

customer_reviews.title: Blade moves way too much
customer_reviews.text: very good shave. But the blade moves way too much. I used this the first time shaving my face. And after binging a crap ton of youtube videos I got the technique down. But the blade just kept moving and there was no way to properly secure it. I woukd say its a 50/50 hit or miss for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Aria Grayson

customer_reviews.title: The Parker is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I just recently started shaving with one of these bad boys and I bought the Parker SRX initially because its great look. It performs just as well as it looks. It's very solid and has a nice weight to it. It also comes with re-fills. It took just two shaves to get comfortable and I haven't cut myself. If you're like me and have thick, course facial that seems to grow overnight, I highly recommend switching to this type of racor.
customer_reviews.author: Todd R.

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: First thing I noticed was it is heavy and well built. My old razor of this style was plastic so I had to adjust my technique. However holding it, it still feels a little unbalanced. The blade stays on really well and is easy to install since the little studs on it are precision made. Overall, I think with some more practice this is a great razor.
customer_reviews.author: Jabir Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Works better, looks better than others at same price point.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to learn the dark art of straight razor shaving. Must have three times as much time and lots of patience to master the technique. Like disposable blades and they are very inexpensive. Adds to your “bad ass” persona, especially for women with tattoos.
customer_reviews.author: Womach

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Razor
customer_reviews.text: Razor works very well. This product seems to be pretty solid and seems lile it will last a long time. It took me some time to get used to using a straight razor / shavette as this was my first one. Once I got the hang of it, I really enjoyed using it. I am able to get clean lines to shape beard.
customer_reviews.author: Aldo F. Plascencia

customer_reviews.title: Professional and stylish handle
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought lasted about two years of in shop usage. Pin that holds the blade in place eventually got loose and fell out. The handle is sturdy and looks great, I liked it enough to buy a second It is heavy compared to other handles, that's a matter of preference.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome peice for awesome price
customer_reviews.text: It is a awesome piece of equipment for an awesome price, by far the best one I've used personally. It has just the right amount of weight to it in my opinion and is put together well. I'm very happy with this purchase and now can get rid of my other razors. And the seller even emailed me afterwords with tips in case you are not familiar with these types of razors. So I couldn't be more pleased all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its a horrible one
customer_reviews.text: Don't get cheated buying this! 1. The quality of the steel is way too bad, really really low quality 2. There are scratches even on a brand new piece 3. The steel came as if it was varnished
customer_reviews.author: Sooraj Ram

customer_reviews.title: Best shaving experience with single blade.
customer_reviews.text: Premium 18/8 stainless steel, first time using a stage the and it's sturdy and heavy. The blades are super sharp and got the closest shave I ever had. Better then the regular throat cutters you have to hone and stripe to even get an edge. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Albert monaco

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use to edge up my beard. It’s complete junk and couldn’t shave stubble that I had grown back since my barber edged me up. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Want to feel like an modern-day cowboy?
customer_reviews.text: As someone that struggled (or blessed) with thick beard growth this is the answer to my prayers. I shaved for the first time with it today and it is incredible. Not only do I feel like a cowboy, but my beard has never been lined up better. People that say they don’t know how to use it should not shave with one of these considering there’s SUPER SIMPLE instructions with it. Also, much much much cheaper than my crappy plastic razors that didn’t get near this close of a shave.
customer_reviews.author: kody crosson

customer_reviews.title: It is a very nice razor very well made
customer_reviews.text: It is a very nice razor very well made. It is however a bit on the heavy side. I had a much lighter cheaply made razor and I think I like usING the lighter on better
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work well for me, hacked my face up pretty bad no matter how careful I was. I am trying to upgrade from a DE, this was rated as a good beginners choice to transition to, didn’t work out for me went back to my DE.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great razor!
customer_reviews.text: Feels very nice in the hands. Easy blade replacement. The blades it came with weren't all that. I prefer derbys, but anyways looks stunning too! A nice addition to my shave stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Justin F.

customer_reviews.title: good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to use a shavette line this. It's really fun and not these difficult. I recommend watching videos online before starting, but this is a good first time buy. The quality feels durable and well made. It doesn't come with a case but I just keep it in the box it came with. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great razor at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great razor. They say it's good for beginners but if you know what your doing it's great old pros. You can't bet the price and it works good for detailing also. Don't spend $400 bucks on a fancy one just to have the blade chip on you. This is all you need.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Feel
customer_reviews.text: Really like the feel of this razor in my hand. I'm fairly new to straight razors so I don't have too much to compare to but I can say that my lines have improved drastically.
customer_reviews.author: Ru B

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Finally decided to upgrade from my previous shavette which was cheaper and flimsier. What a difference it makes having a high quality razor. The handle is sturdy which gives me better control, but also more ergonomic. Mine is used for beard shaping, but I can't recommend this piece enough for anyone who uses SE safety razors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased, there are a few out there
customer_reviews.text: Pleased, there are a few out there you can get that are better, but you will also pay for it, and this unit will do the job with ease!
customer_reviews.author: Whispering Barrels

customer_reviews.title: This thing is sharp! (Pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my dad as a Christmas gift and he loved it! Everyone in the family was in awe of how nice it was, my only complaint is the box it came in has a tacky strip of red velvet material glued on the bottom of the cardboard box, for such a nice razor I was expecting a little something nicer of a storage box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A nice introduction to straight type razors
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent razor, but not for the absolute beginner technique. Looking to upgrade to a real straight razor after using this for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Breese

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Nice hand feel and weight. Opening and closing this razor took about two weeks to work in. Otherwise nice product. I will say customer support from this seller is top top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Does the trick. Unfortunately, the joints are all secured with rivets that cannot be tightened. Possible this may not be a problem - not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Bitchinson

customer_reviews.title: Great price for beginners.  It takes alot of practice.
customer_reviews.text: Clearly I am not able to use this. First pass Wheres my septic pencil. Nice and easy to load the blades.
customer_reviews.author: Copsr303

customer_reviews.title: Great razer, but definitely more of a luxury item.
customer_reviews.text: Super cool razer. Beautiful fit and finish. Its just not as practical as say a safety razer. Mostly for my collection at this point. The first time i looked like i lost a fight with a cat lol
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: I generally like Parker products. Got this as a replacement. The blade portion tends to bend at the hinge point and not close as smoothly as it should. I have to bend it back on almost every use. Other than that it holds the blade well, good weight and shave, just wish the heavy duty was actually heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great starter shavette
customer_reviews.text: Super great blade. It was my first time using a shavette and I highly recommend this as a starter blade. Very comfortable in the hand and easy to get the hang of.
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Parker SRX Heavy Duty Professional Straight Razor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice straight razor from Parker! Good balanced weight and solid quality feel. Beautiful stainless steel polished finish. Very secure and precise blade fitment. This is an awesome, high quality razor for the price! No disappointments at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy R. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Do it
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 Parker razors now but this one was exceptional weight and feels amazing in your hands. Barber recommend
customer_reviews.author: Marie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh.  Not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: Not very impressive. Could be finished nicer. Looks crude. I just feel it’s overpriced for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Real reviewer.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Good weight to it, easy to use, good quality. I did buy different blades to use that are fantastic
customer_reviews.author: El Fantasma

customer_reviews.title: Great straight razor
customer_reviews.text: This razor works good and I liked the shark blades that came with it
customer_reviews.author: David Ramos

customer_reviews.title: I got cut when I bought this overpriced blade!
customer_reviews.text: The way the blade is designed, it doesn't allow for the blade to stick out enough. As a result, I can't detail as much as I'd like. I've had much cheaper blades that allowed for better precision. looks nice, but overrated, and overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than any shavette
customer_reviews.text: Slick craftsmanship, has some weight in the hand, easy usability
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Welch

customer_reviews.title: i love the copper contrast
customer_reviews.text: i love the copper contrast. the razor has good weight, good heft, good balance and good feel. changing the blad is a little challenging, but after three or four chagnes i don't even think about it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: S Yan Wing Chan

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this razor for about a year now, and I almost have no complaints. It’s the perfect weight, looks beautiful, and is very durable. The one thing that could be better is it’s a little tricky loading blades into it but you get used to that after a bit
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Madden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice razor
customer_reviews.text: Been using this razor for about a month now. I bought this when my regular straight went dull and sent it off for honing.. there is a little steeper learning curve with this one and it is less forgiving. but once you figure out the proper angles to hold it at it's a very close comfortable shave.. I actually prefer this on to my regular straight now.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony cox

customer_reviews.title: Well made and well balanced
customer_reviews.text: An excellent Shavette. The training-bra of straight razors. If you're just getting started into straight razor shaving, this is the one to use to perfect your technique before you learn the skills necessary to sharpen and strop a standard straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give zero Stars cheaply made blades are awful...
customer_reviews.author: david bell

customer_reviews.title: Great shaver
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner and I do love this shaver. This item is well made
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a razor with a little more weight and substance and this was perfect. It has a nice finish
customer_reviews.text: Looked at lots of shavette style razors before finally deciding on this. I wanted a razor with a little more weight and substance and this was perfect. It has a nice finish, it's easy to use, easy to swap blades, and gives a nice close shave!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great Shavette!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shavette. My first time using one and I've loved every bit of it. I haven't really cut myself at all, just as long as you are careful and take your time you will be ok. I initially got shark blades but I'm going to test out the feather blades as well
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from SR1
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my damaged SR1 shavette. The finish is much better and the added weight makes it feel much more durable, although only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Nataly Morales

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy this product. Buy the Art of shaving shavette. Its the best one Ive used
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it NO STARS! The first time I used it, the brass pin that holds the razor in place popped out. Cant use it at all. Cant return or exchange it either. Let the record show I never write reviews. But this mad me mad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It works well great for beginners also good for ones who have used them already
customer_reviews.author: bruce.t

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Has great weight which makes shaving easier. Also very sturdy and not flimsy. Have been using for several months now and there is no wear just needs an occasional wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Not agressive enough
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but i find it hard to use because is it is not aggressive like my cheap one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonerrr

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for how much you will save
customer_reviews.text: The material and craftsmanship is very nice, and it does carry a bit of weight with it, I love the razor as a whole but one gripe I seem to have is how much the blade protrudes out of the housing. It doesn't seem to be far enough away from the housing in order to get a close shave.
customer_reviews.author: Jon T.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Really liked it! Did a hair cut on my husband & used this to clean the back of his neck. Had very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful razor, he has yet to use it but ...
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and as described. It’s a beautiful razor, he has yet to use it but was so excited to receive one of quality for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Doud

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shavette for an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shavette. The stainless steel gave it enough weight that it helps with the glide. I shave with straight razors normally and they normally have weight to them, and this felt similar. The bevel head makes for a good beginner shavette.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great razor! It has a good weight to it and seems to be good quality. Been using for over a year and have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A good first straight razor!
customer_reviews.text: I love this razor....it’s great for the guy that is starting or the guy that’s been straight edge shaving for years!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works good stable feeling.
customer_reviews.text: Works good. But hard to get blade in and out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Sindle

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: The quality, the weight, the beauty of it. Small investment to step your shave game up!
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband and he loves it! Great quality & really sharp!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality, perfect weight and balance
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, perfect weight and balance. The method for holding the blade works much better than similar shavettes that use cheap plastic inserts. The only downside is that the polished finish, while attractive looking, doesn't offer much grip. A very minor inconvenience in an otherwise fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Berman

customer_reviews.title: Good razor for beginner!!!
customer_reviews.text: It 's the second shavette i ve' bought. It' s solid ,nice and well made. Compare with that one i had before is much much better but i suggest to combine this razor with green astra blades for a better performance
customer_reviews.author: Blu Jacket

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with product for the price. Some minor pitting in the finish but otherwise looks fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: you'll love it. The best experience is if you use ...
customer_reviews.text: Once you get the hang of using a straight edge, you'll love it. The best experience is if you use a quality clear shaving cream that is used in barbershops.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Great Feel
customer_reviews.text: This has turned into my favorite razor. It has a nice weight and feel and never needs stopping or honing. Great bargain too.
customer_reviews.author: Trumpeter64

customer_reviews.title: Does a good job but be careful
customer_reviews.text: No problems with the blades or razor. Does a good job but be careful. Nicked myself pretty bad the first time make sure you wipe it clean before every pass.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Rybczynski

customer_reviews.title: Good razor
customer_reviews.text: One of the best razors! looks nice and nice weight to it too!
customer_reviews.author: Andres mares

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Came super clean, works exactly like it should, holds blades perfectly, and is actually made out of stainless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very solid shavette
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, but is a bit stiff and heavy
customer_reviews.author: Consuelo Kotowski

customer_reviews.title: replaceable blade razor that has great hand weight so you can let the razor do ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality, replaceable blade razor that has great hand weight so you can let the razor do the work and not push on your skin (and risk cutting yourself). Zero complaints and for the price it is a high value!
customer_reviews.author: BrianS

customer_reviews.title: Clean, close shave
customer_reviews.text: Quality, functional shave. Even as a beginner it is intuitive to use
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this for beginners. Has a solid feel and a tight clamp on the blade setting.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Z.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to open and Brass pin fell out in less than 4 months of owning.
customer_reviews.text: Like the size and feel of this razor, but I've had it less than 4 months and 1 of the brass pins that hold the razor in place has already fallen out. It is also very difficult to move latch to open to replace the razor. I might have just got a bad 1, but would not buy another one. Due to the brass pin falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Breann Fleshman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Nice razor for the price. Easy to handle while shaving.
customer_reviews.author: AddyS

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish could be better
customer_reviews.text: While I like the razor and the pivot pin is snug with a nice weight to it I am disappointed that one of the blade pins is loose and have to fidget with it each time I use it. So it kinda just sits there now.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: It seemed like a very good quality (I am new to straight ...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed like a very good quality (I am new to straight razors) but the blade was loosely held which I'm pretty sure should not be the case. I ended up returning it. It was probably just the one I received.
customer_reviews.author: Violet singh

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, It has a nice weight to it and it looks nice too. The shark razors are great, a lot better than the derby blades that I have. The razor itself is SMALLER than a normal straight razor, for me it works fine but if you are a bigger person with bigger hands, it may be a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Exactly what I required. Easy to replace the blades and to clean. 1 negative though, but not a trainsmash - the handle becomes slippery when wet, which can be dangerous if not held correctly!
customer_reviews.author: MI Keeka

customer_reviews.title: Bf is a barber
customer_reviews.text: Loved this , said it had good weight to it . Easy to use & good blades
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Bro you need this.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first straight razor. However I'm an avid knife collector. I can honestly say this is one of my favorite blade I own. If you know how or are willing to take the time to learn, it makes for a great classic shaving tool. Only downside, I was really hoping for a strong case to keep it in. Packaging is basically trash after you open it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: takes getting a feel for, but it's the best shave ever
customer_reviews.author: Barry L

customer_reviews.title: Love this razor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great straight razor if you are wanting to try being use a straight razor. Very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: james galbraith

customer_reviews.title: The razor is awesome and precise
customer_reviews.text: The razor is awesome and precise. The seller is very easy to work with. When my razor came, it was missing the blades, the seller immediately mailed me more to compensate! Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob S.

customer_reviews.title: Best shave
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. The weight is similar of that to a real straight razor. Clean shave
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P.

product_meta.title: Parker SRX Heavy Duty Professional 100% Stainless Steel Straight Edge Barber Razor and 5 Shark Super Stainless Blades
feature_bullets: A Heavy Duty Razor Designed for Professionals - Heavyweight Steel Blade Arm, and Scales - Weighs 2.3 Ounces
Rounded exposure at the end of the blade compartment to minimize cuts
Clip/Lock blade holder along with inserts to ensure secure blade insertion.
Accepts barbershop single edge blades or 1/2 double edge blade - Comes with 5 Shark Super Stainless Half Blades
A genuine Parker Safety Razor product! For over 40 years, Parker razors have been imitated, but never duplicated
